Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI SET OCORHIST = :OCORHIST, SDOPAGBT = 0, MOVPCSAT = :MOVPCSAT, MOVPCSAN = :MOVPCSAN, DTULTMOV = :DTULTMOV, SITUACAO = :SITUACAO WHERE FONTE = :FONTE AND PROTSINI = :PROTSINI AND DAC = :DAC AND NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND CODLIDER = :CODLIDER AND SINLID = :SINLID END SQL
